title: 介绍自我
author: a242192980
txt_content:
I'm in my world called Good_Th
Whether it is technology: no
Architect: no
Is it a good player
Whether it is a nouveau riche: No, I was poor.
Is there a server: Yes, do not bother to open
算了，不飚英文了，许多人都看不懂QAQ
就这样我的介绍结束QAQ
